channel.title: NPR Topics: Culture
channel.description: Art and entertainment commentary plus interviews, book reviews, movie reviews, music reviews, comedy, and visual art. Subscribe to podcasts and follow trends in music, painting, art, architecture, photography, and design.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: How 'aesthetic' became an adjective
item.description: NPR's Ailsa Chang talks with Shane O'Neill of The Washington Post about the word "aesthetic" and its evolution from art criticism and design theory to online speak and the White House.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Ailsa Chang talks with Shane O'Neill of The Washington Post about the word "aesthetic" and its evolution from art criticism and design theory to online speak and the White House.
item.dc:creator: Linah Mohammad

item.title: In Brooklyn's Park Slope neighborhood, children's entertainment comes with strings
item.description: For more than 30 years, Puppetworks has delighted Brooklyn's Park Slope neighborhood with performances of The Tortoise and the Hare, Pinocchio, Aladdin and, during the holidays, retellings of stories like The Steadfast Tin Soldier.
item.content:encoded:
The Steadfast Tin Soldier show at Coppola's Puppetworks theater in Brooklyn's Park Slope neighborhood.'/>

For more than 30 years, Puppetworks has delighted Brooklyn's Park Slope neighborhood with performances of The Tortoise and the Hare, Pinocchio, Aladdin and, during the holidays, retellings of stories like The Steadfast Tin Soldier.

(Image credit: Anh Nguyen for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Tiffany Ng

item.title: A top-10 list can't contain all the great TV of 2025
item.description: TV critic David Bianculli says 2025 offered so many great shows he couldn't narrow them down. But in a year of intense TV, Netflix's haunting series Adolescence, stands apart.
item.content:encoded: TV critic David Bianculli says 2025 offered so many great shows he couldn't narrow them down. But in a year of intense TV, Netflix's haunting series Adolescence, stands apart.
item.dc:creator: David Bianculli

item.title: Vince Zampella, video game pioneer behind megahit Call of Duty, dies at 55
item.description: One of Vince Zampella's crowning achievements was the creation of the Call of Duty franchise, which has sold more than half a billion games worldwide.
item.content:encoded:
One of Vince Zampella's crowning achievements was the creation of the Call of Duty franchise, which has sold more than half a billion games worldwide.

(Image credit: Paul Sakuma)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: 2025: The images that stayed with us
item.description: Photographs help us look back on the moments that defined the year. Taken by NPR photojournalists nationwide, this collection goes beyond the headlines to reveal quietly powerful human stories.
item.content:encoded:
Photographs help us look back on the moments that defined the year. Taken by NPR photojournalists nationwide, this collection goes beyond the headlines to reveal quietly powerful human stories.

(Image credit: Tyler Russell)
item.dc:creator: Meredith Nierman

item.title: Will Arnett exposes the complexities of marriage and comedy in 'Is This Thing On?'
item.description: Arnett co-wrote his new film, in which he plays a man going through a divorce who finds himself onstage doing stand-up. He also has an extensive voiceover career, and co-hosts the SmartLess podcast.
item.content:encoded: Arnett co-wrote his new film, in which he plays a man going through a divorce who finds himself onstage doing stand-up. He also has an extensive voiceover career, and co-hosts the SmartLess podcast.
item.dc:creator: Terry Gross

item.title: Even in the deep South, people dream of a snowy Christmas
item.description: People in the South keep hoping for a white Christmas, even though they know chances for snow are very very slim.
item.content:encoded: People in the South keep hoping for a white Christmas, even though they know chances for snow are very very slim.
item.dc:creator: Melanie Peeples

item.title: NPR Student Podcast Challenge: Why many Jewish families order Chinese on Christmas
item.description: It's a tradition for many Jewish families: Chinese takeout on Christmas. How did this happen? A group of New York City high schoolers shared their reporting with NPR's Student Podcast Challenge.
item.content:encoded: It's a tradition for many Jewish families: Chinese takeout on Christmas. How did this happen? A group of New York City high schoolers shared their reporting with NPR's Student Podcast Challenge.

item.title: NPR's travel guide: Where we went this year
item.description: NPR's staff traveled a lot in 2025. Here are some places and events we thought you might want to check out.
item.content:encoded: NPR's staff traveled a lot in 2025. Here are some places and events we thought you might want to check out.
item.dc:creator: James Doubek

item.title: 'The Rock' returns as 'The Smashing Machine' (and says his mom will love this interview)
item.description: Former WWE wrestler Dwayne Johnson considered pursuing a career in mixed martial arts — but didn't like getting punched in the face. Now he plays fighter Mark Kerr. Originally broadcast Oct. 2, 2025.
item.content:encoded: Former WWE wrestler Dwayne Johnson considered pursuing a career in mixed martial arts — but didn't like getting punched in the face. Now he plays fighter Mark Kerr. Originally broadcast Oct. 2, 2025.
item.dc:creator: Terry Gross
